channel.title: How to uninstall the game?
channel.description:
Hello there.
I have a little problem- I can't uninstall the Black Mesa. The point is that there is no "Black Mesa" in Window's uninstalling thing, and I can't also delete the game via Steam since for some reason there is no "delete local content" button for Black Mesa.
Of course I can manually delete files from ...Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS but this is not the right way to delete applications since it will leave some junk information in Window's registry.
Please help me.
